participant_1.background:

I remember writing stories with my sister when we were kids.
i recently broke up with my girlfriend.
i don t have a lot of friends.

my favorite drink is cuba libre.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing alright, thanks. I'm a bit sad because I recently broke up with my girlfriend, but I'm trying to stay positive.
I'm sorry to hear that. Breakups are tough, but you'll get through it.
Thanks. I appreciate that. I'm trying to focus on the good times we had together and remember that I can still have fun now.
That's a good attitude. It sounds like you're a strong person and I'm sure you'll be okay.
Thanks. I hope so. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, I played a concert last night and it was a lot of fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's never too late to start! I took lessons when I was a kid and I've been playing ever since.
I might have to look into that. I've been trying to find something to do with my time since I broke up with my girlfriend.
That's a great idea. Music is a great way to express yourself and it can be really therapeutic.
I think I'll do that. Thanks for the suggestion
